languages.text: "Если подумать, Патент позволяет мне нарушать многое из Имперского кредо..."
"Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
languages.original_text: "Если подумать, Патент позволяет мне нарушать многое из Имперского кредо..."

traits.locale_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
"Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
"Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
"Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
"Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
"Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."

languages.text: « Maintenant que j'y pense, ma lettre de marque m'autorise à enfreindre le Credo Impérial de bien des façons... »
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que j'y pense, ma lettre de marque m'autorise à enfreindre le Credo Impérial de bien des façons... »

languages.text: «Ahora que lo pienso, mi Patente me otorga el derecho a violar el credo imperial de muy diversas maneras...».
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que lo pienso, mi Patente me otorga el derecho a violar el credo imperial de muy diversas maneras...».

languages.text: “仔细想想看，我的授状赋予了我很多权力。我可以在很多方面违背帝国的教条……”
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."

traits.locale_text: “仔细想想看，我的授状赋予了我很多权力。我可以在很多方面违背帝国的教条……”

languages.text: 「よく考えたら、私の令状には、さまざまな形で帝国信条集に違反する権利が与えられている…」
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."

traits.locale_text: 「よく考えたら、私の令状には、さまざまな形で帝国信条集に違反する権利が与えられている…」

languages.text: "Wenn ich so darüber nachdenke, gestattet mir mein Handelsbrief, auf vielfältige Weise gegen den Imperialen Glauben zu verstoßen ..."
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich so darüber nachdenke, gestattet mir mein Handelsbrief, auf vielfältige Weise gegen den Imperialen Glauben zu verstoßen ..."

languages.text: "Düşünüyorum da Ruhsatname'm bana İmparatorluk İtikadı'nı birçok açıdan ihlal etme yetkisi veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, my Warrant entitles me to violate the Imperial Creed in many ways..."
